name: Doc Monky Loop
description:
Explore the role of Ishmael a (crazy and thirsty for coffee) researcher, who is devoting himself to finding a way to create everlasting coffee mugs using time travel. Explore elaborate parts of his lab using multiple loops of time.

  • 2.5 Perspective - Explore a completely 3d world from a (not so) unique perspective.
  • Loops - Try using each previous loop in a manner of ways in order to beat a level.
  • Controler Support - The game can be played using both a keyboard and/or a joystick.

This game was developed in 72 hours to the Ludum Dare 47.

We sincerely hope you enjoy it.

  • The game can be played using a joystick
  • It's length ranges between 10 to 25 minutes.
  • You can restart a level at anytime with the Tab key or Select Button.
  • The game intro was made in a rush, but please take a look at it.
